basics.name: MINOUMISSEK CEDRIGUE CLAUVIS
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Dedicated Odoo Technical Developer and Support Specialist with a proven track record of delivering high-quality solutions and exceptional support to clients across diverse industries. Adept at leveraging technical expertise and deep knowledge of the Odoo platform to streamline business processes, enhance efficiency, and drive digital transformation. Proficient in custom module development, system integration, and troubleshooting, ensuring seamless Odoo ERP implementations. Skilled in analyzing client requirements, designing effective solutions, and providing ongoing technical assistance and maintenance. Committed to staying updated with the latest Odoo developments and best practices to consistently deliver innovative solutions and outstanding customer satisfaction. A collaborative team player known for effective communication, problem-solving abilities, and a passion for helping organizations harness the full potential of Odoo for their success.

work.summary: Head of online presence for Ka Leo
highlights: Maintain, update, and oversee official college newspaper website
Drive, design and build student-community projects for UH Manoa
Troubleshoot software, hardware and networking issues over the phone
Answer phone and email responses to the ITS Help Desk

volunteer.organization: Center for Renewable Energy and Island Sustainability
volunteer.summary: Lead developer for weather sensing project
highlights: Design firmware for distributed weather sensor network
Maintain custom data collection and storage infrastructure
Webmaster/IT Officer, IEEE Student Branch, UH Manoa, 2012-2013

awards.title: B+ Scholarship
awards.summary: Scholarships awarded to incoming freshmen and continuing students who complete a rigorous high school curriculum with a minimum overall GPA of 3.0 at a Hawai'i public school.

awards.title: First place
awards.summary: My team won first place in 2015.  See my portfolio site for more details.
